title: Warriors vs. Raptors, Kawhi Leonard, Odell Beckham & The Lakers
itunes:title: Warriors vs. Raptors, Kawhi Leonard, Odell Beckham & The Lakers
description:
Colin explains why people shouldn't bail on the Warriors after their game one loss to the Raptors in the NBA Finals. Colin tells you why Kawhi Leonard would be better off staying in Toronto. Colin says it feels like there is panic surrounding the Houston Rockets. Colin thinks that Odell Beckham is an NBA guy in the NFL and that being at OTA's matter. Colin responds to the latest story about the Lakers and thinks that the team needs to make the right moves to fix the gaps in their locker room. And Colin holds the first ever Herd Spelling Bee.

Guests Include: Chris Broussard, Doug Gottleib and Jason McIntyre

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
